thread.title: Here's Just How Close Harrison Ford Came to Hitting an Airliner

title: Here's Just How Close Harrison Ford Came to Hitting an Airliner
text:
Here's Just How Close Harrison Ford Came to Hitting an Airliner 
Watch footage of the actor's close call. GIF By Eric Limer Feb 22, 2017 Last week, hobbyist pilot and crash survivor Harrison Ford had a bit of an incident at a Southern California when he accidentally flew over American Airlines Flight 1456 as he came in for a landing on a taxiway instead of the intended runway. Now, TMZ has obtained some footage of the actual near-miss which shows just how close Ford came to hitting the passenger jet.   "Was that airliner meant to be underneath me?" Ford is said to have asked air traffic control during the landing. The FAA is currently investigating the incident.
